title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest – Bonnie Campbell

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oklahoma Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: September 29, 2024
Location: Tulsa, OK (Airport)
Suspect: Bonnie Campbell, 53
Incident Summary:
Bonnie Campbell was arrested for allegedly driving under the influence (DUI) on an airport runway. Air traffic control reported that she was blocking the runway and driving around it. Officers arrived and took her into custody, during which she admitted to drinking prior to and while parked at the airport. Officers also noted that this was the second consecutive day they had received reports of her driving under the influence at the airport.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the DUI call at the airport.
Interacted with and questioned Campbell.
Placed Campbell under arrest and transported her.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
